模块 com.example.BubbleBobble

程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Controller

package com.example.BubbleBobble.Controller
  • 类概要
    类
    说明
    BackgroundSettingController
    The class, BackgroundController, is the controller for BackgroundSettingScreen, and is linked with BackgroundSettingScreen.fxml The Background Setting screen contains the radio box to choose from three themes of background: "sea"/li> "mountain" "jungle" The corresponding settings will be transferred to the interactable world
    DifficultySettingController
    The class, DifficultyController, is the controller for DifficultyScreen, and is linked with DifficultySettingScreen.fxml The Difficulty screen contains the radio box to choose from three difficulties: "easy"/li> "medium" "hard" The corresponding settings will be transferred to the interactable world
    GameOverScreenController
    The class, GameOverController, is the controller for GameOverScreen, and is linked with GameOverScreen.fxml The GameOver screen contains information: GameOver title current score current level And the Game Over screen contains several functionalities and entry: NameInput: input the player game submit: button to submit the player name New Game: back to the original start screen High Score List: view the high score list quit: quit the application The GameOver screen also includes some of the validation because it involves writing data to the file, which means data from user manual input should be checked.
    GameWinScreenController
    The class, GameWinController, is the controller for GameWinScreen, and is linked with GameWinScreen.fxml The GameWin screen contains information: GameWin Title final score And the Game win screen contains several functionalities and entry: NameInput: input the player game submit: button to submit the player name New Game: back to the original start screen High Score List: view the high score list quit: quit the application The win screen also includes some of the validation because it involves writing data to the file, which means data from user manual input should be checked.
    HighScoreListController
    The class, HighScoreListController, is the controller for High Score List Screen, and is linked with HighScoreListScreen.fxml The high score list screen contains the information as a table view with two columns and data of: playerName score
    InfoScreenController
     
    StartScreenController
    The class, StartScreenController, is the controller for StartScreen, and is linked with StartScreen.fxml The start screen contains the entry to: start: start the game info: the info of the game high score: the high score list entry quit: quit the application The start screen also contains combo box to choose the color of the hero
